A REST controller providing device management endpoints with filtering, pagination, and status update capabilities. Handles device retrieval, search functionality, and filter options with comprehensive API documentation.

## Key Components

- **getDevices()** - Retrieves paginated list of devices with optional filtering by status, type, OS, organization, and tags
- **getDevice()** - Fetches individual device details by machine ID
- **getDeviceFilters()** - Returns available filter options with counts for device queries
- **updateDeviceStatus()** - Updates device status (DELETED/ARCHIVED) by machine ID
- **DeviceService, DeviceFilterService, TagService** - Injected services for business logic
- **DeviceMapper** - Handles DTO mapping between API and domain models

## Usage Example

```java
// GET /api/v1/devices with filtering and pagination
@GetMapping
public DevicesResponse getDevices(
    @RequestParam List<DeviceStatus> statuses,
    @RequestParam List<DeviceType> deviceTypes,
    @RequestParam String search,
    @RequestParam Boolean includeTags,
    @RequestParam Integer limit,
    @RequestParam String cursor) {
    // Returns paginated device list with optional tag inclusion
}

// GET /api/v1/devices/{machineId}
@GetMapping("/{machineId}")
public DeviceResponse getDevice(@PathVariable String machineId) {
    // Returns single device with tags
}

// PATCH /api/v1/devices/{machineId}
@PatchMapping("/{machineId}")
public void updateDeviceStatus(
    @PathVariable String machineId,
    @RequestBody UpdateDeviceStatusRequest request) {
    // Updates device status
}
```
